tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE donation_history (
  donation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id UUID,
  donation_amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE donors (
    donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name VARCHAR(255),
    donor_email VARCHAR(255),
    total_donation_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    last_donation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE donations (
    donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INT,
    donation_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    donation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INT,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    email_content TEXT,
    email_sent_date DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id)
)
CREATE TABLE donors ( donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, donor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, donor_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, total_donation_amt DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE donations ( donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, donor_id INT, donation_amt DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, donation_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id) );
CREATE TABLE email_templates ( template_id INT PRIMARY KEY, template_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email_subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email_content TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE donor_conditions ( condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY, donor_id INT, donation_amt_condition DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, last_donation_date_condition DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id) );
